definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Leptons , the best known of which is the electron, are immune to the strong force.
sentences.chinese: 輕子中最著名的是電子，這類粒子不會感受到強力。

sentences.english: Force is a physical power, and I fail to see what moral effect it can have.
sentences.chinese: 強力是一種物質力量，我看不出它具有什麼道德後果。

sentences.english: I have no cramps and I feel strong.
sentences.chinese: 我手腳沒有抽筋，我感到身強力壯。

sentences.english: Glue- sniffing among Singapore's youth is making a worrying comeback after many years in decline.
sentences.chinese: 沉寂多年的青少年嗅吸強力膠現象死灰復燃。

sentences.english: Between the breakers and shore, a lot of water goes in and goes out with a lot of force.
sentences.chinese: 在岸邊和碎浪之間，在強力的推動下，水湧來湧去。

sentences.english: Second there is the weak passive defense reaction.
sentences.chinese: 第一種是，強力被動防禦反應。

sentences.english: The magnetic field should act as a strong brake on a magnetar's rotation.
sentences.chinese: 磁場對超強磁星體的自轉應該是一種強力的煞車。

sentences.english: Strong soaps can strip oil from your skin.
sentences.chinese: 強力皁能夠強力洗去你皮膚中的油分。

sentences.english: Strong soaps can strip oil from your skin.
sentences.chinese: 強力皁能夠強力洗去你皮膚中的油分。

sentences.english: Police found a gun and duct tape at the second-year medical student's Quincy, Mass., home.
sentences.chinese: 警察在其昆西的家中發現了一把手槍和強力膠帶。

sentences.english: The military government clamped a curfew onto the capital.
sentences.chinese: 軍事政府強力執行宵禁令。

sentences.english: I feel as well and strong as ever.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得身強力壯一如以往。

sentences.english: Sacrifices a doll to fire a super high-power laser.
sentences.chinese: 犧牲一個人偶發射出超強力激光。

sentences.english: Stiffness structure, powerful slide seat design, high processing precision, and long service lift.
sentences.chinese: 剛性結構，強力滑座設計，加工精度高，壽命長。

sentences.english: "There's very strong evidence for this, " Norenzayan says.
sentences.chinese: “有強力證據支持這點，”羅倫薩揚說到。

sentences.english: It is a powerful bactericide, which is yet another excellent reason for using it in treating cuts.
sentences.chinese: 它是強力殺菌劑，這也是適合治療傷口的原因之一。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to hit/to strike/to attack/to crack down on sth/blow/(psychological) shock/percussion (music)
to make a supreme effort/at all costs
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
